title: Prohibits rental vehicle companies from charging exorbitant rates for unfueled vehicles returned by customers
summary: Prohibits rental vehicle companies from charging exorbitant rates for unfueled vehicles returned by customers; provides that any refueling charge imposed as part of a rental agreement shall be no higher than a rate which exceeds the highest retail rate of gasoline within a one-half mile radius of such rental vehicle company; imposes a fine of five hundred dollars per violation.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to rates charged for rental vehicle refueling
